You see the tower up there—the one with the blue drek pouring out the top? That's the Cyasma Spire.

I need to study it to find a way to hurt them, but the entrance is heavily guarded. I need you to kill the master of the spire and its kalash defenders. If you can keep them busy, I can get all of my research done in one go.

Find Ginea when you're done.

Thanks to you, we've held our own and weakened our foe considerably. I didn't think it possible.

We're also closer to finding this argon queen—Shandra Manaya."Any news about her?"

My younger sister's on her trail, so that's where you're going next. Report to {@LinkCreature:250#1006} at Shroud Outpost.

And please take good care of her.

Welcome to the argons' back door. My brother uses glowing terms about you.

Let's get down to business.
